title: Altering Python's Evaluation Strategy
description: The talk is focused on altering Python's evaluation strategy when it comes to chained comparison operators and makes it C-like. To achieve this we explore the internals, trace to the root, and change the runtime a bit.

title: Search - As you should know it
description: The talk is focussed on basics of Information Retrieval. We cover lookups, indexing, relevance by intuition, math behind relevance, building a toy search engine and squeezing out the performance from it.
